name: Bed Mobility Capacity Mismatch Factor (M_?*)
functionStatement: Bankfull shear/transport capacity matches bed resistance (near threshold).
descriptionMarkdown: Mismatch factor for Shields stress at bankfull: M = max(?*bf/?*crit, ?*crit/?*bf). Lower is better; minimum is 1.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Compute ?*bf from bankfull R and slope; choose ?*crit; compute mismatch factor M.

inputs.label: Bed Mobility Capacity Mismatch Factor (M_?*)
inputs.helpMarkdown: Bankfull hydraulics (R,S) + D50; optional HEC-RAS or field cross-sections.

sourceMetadata.metricDataSource: Bankfull hydraulics (R,S) + D50; optional HEC-RAS or field cross-sections.
sourceMetadata.metricStatement: Bankfull shear/transport capacity matches bed resistance (near threshold).
sourceMetadata.description: Mismatch factor for Shields stress at bankfull: M = max(?*bf/?*crit, ?*crit/?*bf). Lower is better; minimum is 1.
sourceMetadata.howToMeasure: Compute ?*bf from bankfull R and slope; choose ?*crit; compute mismatch factor M.
referencesRaw: SFARI rapid assessment; Shields stress methods; hydraulic geometry references.

stratifications.name: Proposed (derived from SFARI rapid curves) - Select ?*crit appropriate to bed material and stream type (gravel/cobble vs sand).
stratifications.stratification: Select ?*crit appropriate to bed material and stream type (gravel/cobble vs sand).
